item.description:
The documentary-like story tells of a yellow Labrador Retriever guide dog for the blind named Quill. We follow Quill from the litter, his selection to become a guide, and his schoool trainingin preparation to guide the sightless. He is then paired with a blind man who is at first reluctant to rely on Quill.

2004 Japan Subtitles Directed by Sai Yoichi
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the lobby wearing a yellow jacket

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: Quill
